variables-naming-conventions_key2: It is very important to give a correct `name` to a `Variable`.
variables-naming-conventions_key3: If you don't give names properly, then nobody will be able to read your `Code`, as they won't be able to understand that for what purpose the `variable` is used?
variables-naming-conventions_key4:
`camelCase`
`PascalCase`
`snake_case`
`UPPER_CASE`
`kebab-case`
are five most popular `cases` for naming.

variables-naming-conventions_key33: ### P.S: Many candidates get rejected in their interviews, because they don't name the `variables` properly, and the company does not like this.
